column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I have tried the vegetarian ramen a few times.  The broth is decent
column2: and the ramen is seasoned with black pepper and ample vegetables.  At times
column3: the broth can be a bit too bland
column4: but you are able to add the spicy sauce to it for an additional cost
column5: which adds a much-needed kick to the broth.  Also
column6: adding a seasoned egg really adds to the dish.
